Topic.Title: Deleting a game on quest online?

Posts.EditableText: Hi, this is my first time using the forums so I'm not sure if I'm posting in the right place. But I'm using quest the online version and I just wondered how I delete a text adventure that I have started making, as I messed it up and wish to start over. And also how do you rename one that you started too? I can only see edit and publish near the game I have created, and also start a new game. Thanks Devis
Posts.HTML:
Hi, this is my first time using the forums so I'm not sure if I'm posting in the right place. But I'm using quest the online version and I just wondered how I delete a text adventure that I have started making, as I messed it up and wish to start over. And also how do you rename one that you started too?

I can only see edit and publish near the game I have created, and also start a new game.

Thanks
Devis

Posts.EditableText: You can't delete or rename online games at the moment.
Posts.HTML: You can't delete or rename online games at the moment.

Posts.EditableText: Ok thanks. Will this be available at anytime?
Posts.HTML: Ok thanks. Will this be available at anytime?
